senses.sense_definition: Any compound containing three acetate groups.

examples.text: The laboratory synthesized a stable <w>triacetate</w> for the new coating formula.
Glycerol <w>triacetate</w> is frequently utilized in the food industry as a solvent.

senses.sense_definition: A synthetic fibre manufactured from cellulose triacetate, known for being resistant to shrinking and wrinkling.

examples.text: She bought a dress made of a <w>triacetate</w> blend that holds its shape well.
Manufacturers prefer <w>triacetate</w> fabric for pleated garments because it can be heat-set permanently.
